text:
@realDonaldTrump @Michael_Rae @BreitbartNews Why do you think the cabal is creating this bullshit, violence, dragging out all their play cards, covid19, white vs black, vs cops? TO INCITE THE OPPOSITION so that they will stoop to [their] level of violence through anger. Don't do it! 

Love is supreme power.
